instructions.step1: Use github-mcp-server-search_repositories to get all repositories
instructions.step2: For each repo, use github-mcp-server-get_file_contents to get root directory
instructions.step3: Find LICENSE files and download their content
instructions.step5: Generate deletion instructions for MIT licenses
